title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 641.9 - New funds defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 641.9 - New funds defined

State Regulations

New funds means the amount by which the aggregate amount of
funds advanced or readvanced under a prior recorded mortgage exceeds the amount
upon which the mortgage recording taxes were paid when such prior mortgage was
recorded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
641.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
